@ATorygirl @carol_hulme @BBCNews Yes and we are learning that it was about during last November. I bet that a lot of us have had a mild form of it. I was puzzled by what i had from before Xmas to about 3 weeks ago. That, and the world's governments response smacks of escaped bio weapon.
